    import torch
    from tlse_hyp_data_set import TlseHypDataSet
    from tlse_hyp_data_set.utils.transforms import GaussianFilter, SpectralIndices, GaborFilters, Concat

    dataset = TlseHypDataSet('/path/to/dataset/')
    dataset.transform = transforms.Compose([

                    Concat([
                        SpectralIndices(dataset.wv[dataset.bbl]),
                        GaborFilters()
                        ]),
